Introduction

Hyeongseop is a South Korean singer and actor under Yue Hua Entertainment.

He was first known for appearing and competing in the second season of Mnet's hit survival show Produce 101 in 2017, where he was eliminated in the final episode after ranking 16th place.

Soon after, he debuted as an actor in Naver TV Cast's web drama "Mischievous Detectives", which aired from September 12 to September 28, 2017. He also played in the second season of the show.

The same year, he made his official debut as half of the duo HyeongseopXEuiwoong, along fellow labelmate and group member Lew. They debuted on November 2, 2017, with the release of the digital single "The Moment of Memory".

On January 3, 2022, Hyeongseop was revealed as the fourth member of Yue Hua Entertainment's upcoming boy group TEMPEST. He debuted as a member of the group on March 2, 2022, with the release of their first mini album titled "It's ME, It's WE".

Hyeongseop was an MC for SBS M's The Show along ATEEZ's Yeosang and NCT's Xiaojun from March 28, 2023 to March 5, 2024.
